activities: AthenaOnline operates an online business education site which allows users to access videos and articles for self-development. Data collected is limited to email addresses and passwords. In some cases job titles may also be used for login and tracking. Credit card or other financial data is not collected or stored on our servers.
personaldata: human resources data, email, and site usage
recoursemech: Athena's commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
